answers.answer: My blood pressure with my first was always a little on the high side. They took the non stress tests towards the end and everything came back ok..they said maybe I had doctor anxiety and that's why it was high at the appts. I tracked my BP at home and it was always fine. So don't get all worried quite yet! Sometimes it works out. If not..well you will prob be seeing baby a little earlier than your due date.

I had it with my first and last daughter. Wasn't told both times until the end of both pregnancies when my blood pressure was so high it indangered babies and I could have went into seizures.Both times I was so swollen I wasn't able to get an epidural and had to be induced. As far as I can remember (99 & 08) all symptoms I had beforehand was elevated bp & protein in urine. I am praying I don't get it this go around as I am having another girl but I never got it with my boy. Wonder if it have anhthing to do with gender...

question: Okay any other mothers out there that have preeclampsia &had a safe pregnancy? My DR said i dont have it but i have to get tested for it because my blood pressure was high. They want to be on the safe side. Any stories or experiences from it please share!
title: worried.
